pages.text: This spiritual treasure lets a cultivator peer into the deepest depths of their bodies constitution and start their cultivation journey. Once $(qi) is injected into this treasure, a cultivator can examine themselves and see their cultivation realm and statistics. A cultivator can also examine another cultivators realm and statistics depending on how powerful they are, by using the treasure while shifting.
If a cultivator combines an iron mirror with low spirit stones, they can craft this spiritual treasure.
